results.name: Virtual exhibition - Surfing without the Frills
Baldi super fast no faild link

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10;
  • Processor: CPU with 2 cores of 2,4 Ghz;
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card that supports DirectX11 and with at least 1 GB of VRam;
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10;
  • Processor: CPU with 4 cores of 2,4 Ghz;
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DirectX11 support and with at least 2 GB of RAM (nVidia GTX660 or higher, or AMD HD5870 or higher);
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:

  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 (or better)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radion RX 480, NVIDIA GTX 1060 (or better)
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5-4570 or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1030, MX 250, AMD RX550 or similar.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A lightgun is STRONGLY recommended. Ultrawide monitors are supported but limited to 16:9 aspect ratio.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 2600, Intel i7-8700 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060, AMD RX 580 or similar.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A lightgun is STRONGLY recommended. Ultrawide monitors are supported but limited to 16:9 aspect ratio.
